description.en-US: Control the snake, collect food and avoid collision with your own tail. Every time a snake eats a piece of food, it becomes longer, which gradually complicates the game.

summary.ar: Play the Snake game in popup in your browser. Eat, grow and try not to crash.
summary.bg: Play the Snake game in popup in your browser. Eat, grow and try not to crash.
summary.ca: Jugar el joc de la Serp en emergent en el vostre navegador. Menjar, créixer i tractar de no xocar.
summary.cs: Hrát Had hru v pop-up ve vašem prohlížeči. Jíst, růst, a pokusit se nenarazit.
summary.da: Spil Snake spil i popup i din browser. Spise, vokse og forsøge ikke at gå ned.
summary.de: Spielen Sie das Spiel der Schlange in popup in Ihrem browser. Essen, wachsen und versuchen, nicht zum Absturz zu bringen.
